node.html: A small web application to visualize a Monte Carlo simulation for percolation.
A Spigot (Minecraft server software) plugin that displays useful bee-related information.
0xShot is a simple bash script and a web application written in Python which allows to take screenshots and upload them to a server.
An attempt to make a small operating system for the Raspberry Pi Zero (W), based on the Baking Pi tutorial from the University of Cambridge
A web application which categorizes news articles by sentiment. News headlines are queried every few minutes and classified using a BERT model trained on articles from the BBC.
